mapper.select: SELECT a.* FROM ( SELECT code, content, image, tag, address, create_time createTime, nickname, ROUND(ST_DISTANCE_SPHERE(POINT(longitude, latitude), POINT(#{lng}, #{lat}))) distance FROM footprint WHERE geohash REGEXP CONCAT('(', #{aroundGeoHash}, ')') HAVING distance < #{range} ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 10) a ORDER BY a.distance, a.createTime desc
mapper.update: UPDATE footprint SET image = #{image} WHERE id = #{id} LIMIT 1
